0: After Hashem cautioned the Jews so they wont die, He said to Moshe, to warn Aaron as well so he wont die as his sons did. And this Parsha is a sign that Aaron sons brought a Ketores offering inside the curtain (in the Holy of Holies)

1.0: "You shall not hate your brother." [This is the] opposite of [the commandment,] "Love your neighbor." And behold, these commandments are completely implanted in the heart. By keeping them, they will settle [back] in the land, since it was out of baseless hatred that the second temple was destroyed.

2.0: The reason [for this phrase] is to tell [us] that a gentile can acquire an Israelite slave.
